instructions: Cook onion in butter in pan till tender.
Add water and box of rice and seasoning packets.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer 20 minutes.
Combine flour and dry mustard in bowl.
Add 1/2 cups broth gradually, stirring until smooth.
Stir rest of broth, flour and milk into rice mix.
Heat to a simmer, stirring occasionally.
